feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Thu, 31 Aug 2023 08:03:13
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Sennheiser has released a new soundbar that is smaller and cheaper than previous models.
- Apple has launched a new event page for the release of the iPhone 15.
- Tesla is under investigation by the DOJ and SEC for its secretive "Project 42".
- The US Copyright Office is working on new rules for generative AI.
- Mux, a video infrastructure company, is hiring a Senior Platform Engineer.

Business:
- The Global Professional Development Market is projected to grow by USD 21,958.09 million during 2022-2027, with a CAGR of 7.83%.
- The Global Test Preparation Market is expected to grow by USD 46,860.24 million during 2022-2027, with a CAGR of 6.88%.
- Poland is making significant purchases of tanks and helicopters, possibly inspired by the US Army.
- A Memphis plant that uses potentially hazardous chemicals will be closing.
- A Texas judge has ruled a law limiting the power of Democrat-led cities as unconstitutional.

AI:
- The US Copyright Office is working on new rules for generative AI.
- AI21 Labs, a generative AI startup, has raised $155 million at a valuation of $1.4 billion.
- DenseDiffusion, a training-free AI technique, aims to address dense captions and layout manipulation in text-to-image generation.

Other:
- An elite team of Ukrainian snipers, known as "Devils and Angels," is targeting top Russian commanders to demoralize troops.
- A passenger went overboard from Royal Caribbean's Wonder of the Seas, the largest operating cruise ship in the world.
- Interstellar debris falling to the sea floor is met with skepticism.
- The Pacific metal discovered is believed to be beyond extraterrestrial.
- The best ways to earn credit card points on rent and mortgage payments are discussed.
- Pot stocks have surged as a federal agency reportedly seeks to downgrade cannabis from the hard-drug category.
- An indicator of Americans' willingness to gamble suggests resilience in the US economy.
